com.hellokaton.blade.mvc

类 RouteContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hellokaton.blade.mvc.RouteContext

  • public class RouteContext
extends Object
    Integration of Request and Response operations
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.9.ALPHA1
    作者:
    biezhi
    另请参阅:
    Request, Response
